data.text: Na Hiob buae se,
“Sɛ wobetumi akari mʼawerɛhowdi
anka emu bɛyɛ duru asen nwea a ɛwɔ po mu nyinaa,
Otumfo agyan no wɔ me mu,
Wuram afurum su wɔ bere a wanya sare ana,
So wodi aduan a nkyene nni mu?
Mempɛ sɛ mede me nsa ka;
“Ao sɛ me nsa bɛka mʼabisade,
sɛ Onyankopɔn bɛpɛ sɛ ɔdwerɛw me
ɛne anka mɛkɔ so anya saa awerɛkyekye yi,
“Ahoɔden bɛn na mewɔ a enti ɛsɛ sɛ minya anidaso?
Mewɔ ahoɔden sɛ ɔbo ana?
So mewɔ tumi bi a mede bɛboa me ho
“Obiara a ɔbɔ nʼadamfo ayamye sɛn no
Nanso ahotoso nni me nuanom mu sɛ nsuwansuwa a eyiri na ɛyow,
bere a sukyerɛmma renan
nanso owiabere mu no ɛsen bio
Akwantufo man fi wɔn akwan so;
Tema akwantufo hwehwɛ nsu,
Wɔn ho yeraw wɔn, efisɛ na wɔwɔ awerehyɛmu;
Afei, wo nso woakyerɛ sɛ wo so nni mfaso;
So maka pɛn se, ‘Me nti momma biribi,
sɛ munnye me mfi mʼatamfo nsam,
“Monkyerɛkyerɛ me, na mɛyɛ komm;
Nokwareka yɛ yaw,
So mokyerɛ sɛ mubesiesie sɛ nea meka no,
Mpo mobɛbɔ ayisaa so ntonto,
“Afei momfa ahummɔbɔ nhwɛ me.
Montɔ mo bo ase, mummu ntɛnkyew;
Amumɔyɛsɛm wɔ mʼano ana?
